sentences.english: who works in the entertainment industry and she lives in SoHo.
sentences.chinese: 她的婶婶在娱乐行业工作，住在SOHO。

sentences.english: He spent holidays at the 300-acre estate of his aunt and uncle.
sentences.chinese: 他在叔叔和婶婶的300英亩庄园里度过许多假日。

sentences.english: My aunt was blind by then.

sentences.chinese: 那是照片上的卢佩婶婶。

sentences.english: My aunt and uncle live in Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 我的叔叔和婶婶住在温哥华。

sentences.english: My great aunt crocheted a beautiful bedspread for me.
sentences.chinese: 我亲爱的婶婶给我织了一个漂亮的床罩。

sentences.english: I spent my childhood with my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 我的童年是和婶婶度过的。

sentences.english: We get together with my aunts, uncles and cousins.
sentences.chinese: 她是大超叔叔和梅萍婶婶的女儿。

sentences.english: He decided to give his aunt one last chance.
sentences.chinese: 他决定还是再给婶婶最后一个机会。

sentences.english: To treat his auntie, he went to Xianling Island to find drug.
sentences.chinese: 为了救婶婶，李逍遥前往仙灵岛去求取灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: Anty & uncle, we are a family.
sentences.chinese: 叔叔和婶婶我们是一家。

sentences.english: My aunt lives in a pretty thatched cottage in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我婶婶住在乡下的一间茅草屋里。

sentences.english: I can't thrash Aunt March, so I suppose I shall have to bear it.
sentences.chinese: 我不可以痛打马奇婶婶，所以我只好随她怎么叫。

sentences.english: Uncle Brendan and Aunt Anne have agreed to let me stay and help out on the farm.
sentences.chinese: 布莱登叔叔和安妮婶婶已经同意让我住下来帮助农场。

definition: older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
